titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for restraining the importation of Lattin VVire into this kingdome, and for support of that manufacture here.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at our court at Oatlands in the nineteenth day of August, in the fourteenth yeer of our reign.
Arms 24; Steele notation: this of 2) or com-.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
